name: Escape To Mars (Ancarus)
description:
Escape To Mars

A game with inspirations like Pac-Man and Eat Girl, Escape To Mars is a game about puzzle and abilites require good time of player.

Story

You are an alien in your uncontrolled ship that needs to return to Mars, where it is your homeland, as soon as possible to warn everyone of the invasion of the Cyclops that could cause the extinction of your civilization.

Feel free for to send one suggestion on comments.

Follow me on Twitter for more news  about this project.

@AncarusBardo
